attributes.action: Bill to have the David Cameron and his cabinet ministers impeached for treason against the British People
attributes.additional_details:
The Prime Minister of this country is guilty of treason against the hard working people of this country.

Billions of OUR pounds are being pumped into foreign aid into countries such as China, Brazil, India, which are already the fastest growing economies in the world

Meanwhile, in Britain, millions are being made redundant due to closures of hospitals, care centres, schools, etc due to Government cuts, while others face unemployment due to large contracts being outsourced to other countries.

This so-called 'democratic' Government has proven its inadequecy and deceitfulness far too many times to allow it to continue representing the people of this country.  From the 'sexed up' dossier that led us into war on a lie, to the recent expenses scandal, the government process of the United Kingdom CANNOT go on, bumping from one disaster to another like this.

Its time to act. Our children are out of control, our pensioners are freezing and starving. Enough is enough.
